title: IIT Roorkee Hits New Milestone with ₹18.2 LPA Average Package
summary: IIT Roorkee witnessed its best placement drive ever, with participation from global and domestic recruiters.

sections.heading: Placement Overview
paragraphs: The highest package offered reached ₹1.5 crore at an international fintech firm.
Median salary stood at ₹17.0 LPA, up from previous year’s ₹15.4 LPA.

sections.heading: Top Recruiters
paragraphs: Amazon, Microsoft, JP Morgan, and Reliance were among the top hirers.
Consulting also emerged as a strong sector with offers from Deloitte, PwC, and EY.
